segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink gushing water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's still running, and no one's doing a thing about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor woman is just standing there polishing a plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's splashing all over the cabinets and floor, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her foot in the puddle already, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now these kids, climbing up to steal cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, it's going to collapse any minute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, one wrong move and he'll crash down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting there, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All those dishes stacked up, probably going to get ruined if someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's total disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing this insanity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies in the jar look tempting, but not worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
